'''Greg''' is an [[NPC]] who wanders the [[Drunkard Gorge]] in [[Mondstadt]] during the night.

==Profile==
<!--detailed story/lore information goes here-->
Greg is unadmittedly a [[Treasure Hoarder]], bearing the Ravenwing insignia on his bandana, seeking drunks to rob. He claims to be an employee at the Dawn Winery, even saying [[Diluc]] gave him a bottle from his private stock.

===Personality===
Greg is a manipulative individual, earnestly seeking to take advantage of drunkards and rob them. He immediately loses interest in those who  are sober.

===Appearance===
Greg is a man of average height and build with medium-length sunflower blonde hair. His eyes are almond-shaped and golden, framed by a pair of bold eyebrows. His hair is kept in a low, thin ponytail messy bangs are swept to the left side of his face, nearly covering his eye.

He wears a white shirt with a military green sailor's collar and diamond patterned short sleeves. He covers the lower half of his face with a navy blue bandana that bears a black insignia on the top left corner. He wears military green joggers and leather boots with white laces. His attire has an assortment of leather belts and strappings.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Greg:''' You wanna grab a drink or two?
:{{DIcon}} Who are you?
::'''Greg:''' The name's Greg! I work at the Dawn Winery &mdash; Master Diluc was in a good mood today and he gave me a bottle from his private stock!
::'''Greg:''' Good wine should be enjoyed in the company of good people! How's about you come with me to the winery and we crack this open together?
::'''Greg:''' Hmm... I must say I seem to have forgotten my way, the Dawn Winery is... northwest from here, right?
::{{DIcon}} No.
:::'''Greg:''' Tut-tut... You're clearly sober if your sense of direction is intact.
:::'''Greg:''' Get outta my face, you non-drunkard!
::{{DIcon}} Yes.
:::'''Greg:''' Hehehe, well, well, well... Off we go then!
:::'''Greg:''' It looks like someone's had a bit too much to drink! Here &mdash; let me hold you up...
:::'''Greg:''' Come on, don't worry about it! There's still a long way to go, let me hold you up.
:::{{DIcon}} You've been staring at my coin pouch this whole time.
:::'''Greg:''' Ai-ya, my friend! Listen to the hurtful words you are saying! I couldn't possibly steal from you...
:::'''Greg:''' ...Wait, how did you even notice?
:::'''Greg:''' If you're not drunk, then quit pretending to be! You're wasting my time!
:::'''Greg:''' Go on, move along. I've got no further interest in you.
:{{DIcon}} The feeling is mutual.
::'''Greg:''' Whatever.
{{Dialogue end}}
